scripts.env-check: node -e "console.log('NODE_ENV:', process.env.NODE_ENV); console.log('DATABASE_URL exists:', !!process.env.DATABASE_URL); console.log('DATABASE_PUBLIC_URL exists:', !!process.env.DATABASE_PUBLIC_URL); console.log('PGHOST exists:', !!process.env.PGHOST); console.log('PGPORT exists:', !!process.env.PGPORT); console.log('PGDATABASE exists:', !!process.env.PGDATABASE); console.log('PGUSER exists:', !!process.env.PGUSER); console.log('PGPASSWORD exists:', !!process.env.PGPASSWORD);"
